---
  title: "Polarized Politics in South Korea (Lexington, 2021)"
---
  
This book is available from Rowman & Littlefield. This is the Online Appendix.

To replicate the analyses with my code, you need R. 

I provide the RDS files of the processed words that correspond with the data selection and preprocessing as described in the book. The preproprocessing code is in the github repository.
